values.description: Base URL for the social media API. Update this to point to your actual API endpoint.
API version for the social media platform
Dynamically generated test email for registration (set by pre-request script)
Dynamically generated test username for registration (set by pre-request script)
Dynamically generated test full name for registration (set by pre-request script)
Test password for registration and login (set by pre-request script)
User ID returned from registration endpoint (set automatically)
Email address of registered user (set automatically after registration)
Username of registered user (set automatically after registration)
JWT access token from login endpoint (set automatically after login)
Token expiration time in seconds (set automatically after login)
Current user's profile ID (set after profile retrieval)
Current user's username from profile (set after profile retrieval)
Timestamp of current request (set by global pre-request script)
Current environment name for debugging and logging
Enable detailed console logging for debugging
